description.lang: Connect your Basement Watchdog Battery Backup Sump Pump to your Z-Wave network and receive Sump Pump Alerts directly to your phone!From notifications when the backup system has turned on to problems with your pump motor or battery.You won't have to wonder any longer if your sump pump system is working properly.

Z-Wave Plus LifelineDevice Reset Locally (via 3 quick presses of the program switch)NotificationsoAC Mains DisconnectedoReplace Battery NowoSystem Hardware FailureSystem Hardware Failure with manufacturer-proprietary failure code (codes detailed below)
NotificationsoAC Mains DisconnectedoReplace Battery NowoSystem Hardware FailureSystem Hardware Failure with manufacturer-proprietary failure code (codes detailed below)
